mapper.select: SELECT em.id AS maker_enterprise_id, m.id AS maker_id, e.id AS enterprise_id, m.phone_number, m. NAME, m.idcard_no, a.paper_agreement_url, m.bank_card_no, m.bank_card_verify_status, a.online_agreement_url, a.sign_state, a.create_time FROM diyi_maker_enterprise em INNER JOIN diyi_maker m ON em.maker_id = m.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise e ON e.id = em.enterprise_id INNER JOIN diyi_agreement a ON a.maker_id = m.id WHERE em.enterprise_id =#{param1} AND em.is_deleted = 0 AND m.is_deleted = 0 AND e.is_deleted = 0 AND a.is_deleted = 0 AND agreement_type = 'MAKERJOINAGREEMENT'

SELECT a.id AS agreement_id,m.name as maker_name, s.id AS service_provider_id, a.agreement_no, a.sign_type, a.agreement_type, s.service_provider_name, a.online_agreement_url, a.paper_agreement_url, a.create_time, a.sign_state FROM diyi_agreement a INNER JOIN diyi_maker m ON a.maker_id = m.id INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider_maker pa ON pa.maker_id = m.id INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider s ON pa.service_provider_id = s.id WHERE a.agreement_type = 'SERVICEPROVIDERJOINAGREEMENT'
and a.agreement_no like concat('%', #{param1}, '%')
and m.name like concat('%', #{param3}, '%')
AND pa.service_provider_id = #{param2}

and a.agreement_no like concat('%', #{param1}, '%')
and e.enterprise_name like concat('%', #{param3}, '%')
AND s.service_provider_id = #{param2}

SELECT a.id AS agreement_id, s.id AS service_provider_id,e.enterprise_name, a.agreement_no, a.sign_type, a.agreement_type, s.service_provider_name, a.online_agreement_url, a.paper_agreement_url, a.create_time, a.sign_state FROM diyi_agreement a INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise e ON a.enterprise_id = e.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise_service_provider ep ON ep.enterprise_id = e.id INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider s ON ep.service_provider_id = s.id WHERE a.agreement_type = 'SERENTSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT'
and a.agreement_no like concat('%', #{param1}, '%')
and e.enterprise_name like concat('%', #{param3}, '%')

SELECT a.id AS agreement_id, s.id AS service_provider_id,e.enterprise_name, a.agreement_no, a.sign_type, a.agreement_type, s.service_provider_name, a.online_agreement_url, a.paper_agreement_url, a.create_time, a.sign_state FROM diyi_agreement a INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise e ON a.enterprise_id = e.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise_service_provider ep ON ep.enterprise_id = e.id INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider s ON ep.service_provider_id = s.id WHERE a.agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEPROMISE'
and a.agreement_no like concat('%', #{param1}, '%')
and e.enterprise_name like concat('%', #{param3}, '%')
AND s.service_provider_id = #{param2}

SELECT a.id AS agreement_id,a.agreement_no, me.maker_id, me.enterprise_id, m. NAME AS maker_name, e.enterprise_name, a.online_agreement_url, a.paper_agreement_url, a.create_time FROM diyi_agreement a INNER JOIN diyi_maker_enterprise me ON me.enterprise_id = a.enterprise_id INNER JOIN diyi_maker m ON m.id = me.maker_id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise e ON e.id = me.enterprise_id WHERE m.id = #{param1} AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTMAKSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT' and a.sign_state = 'SIGNED'
and e.enterprise_name like concat('%', #{param2}, '%')

SELECT a.id AS agreement_id, a.agreement_no, ep.service_provider_id, ep.enterprise_id, sp.service_provider_name, e.enterprise_name, a.online_agreement_url, a.paper_agreement_url, a.create_time FROM diyi_agreement a INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise_provider ep ON ep.service_provider_id = a.service_provider_id INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider sp ON sp.id = ep.service_provider_id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise e ON e.id = ep.enterprise_id WHERE e.id = #{param1} AND a.agreement_type = 'SERVICEPROVIDERJOINAGREEMENT' and a.sign_state = 'SIGNED'

SELECT m.id maker_id, m.certification_state, m.name, m.video_audit, ( SELECT IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.maker_id = m.id AND a.agreement_type = 'MAKERJOINAGREEMENT' ) AS maker_join_agreement, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.maker_id = m.id AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTMAKSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT' ) AS ent_mak_supplementary_agreement, ( SELECT IF (COUNT(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.maker_id = m.id AND a.agreement_type = 'MAKERPOWERATTORNEY' ) AS maker_power_attorney FROM diyi_maker m where 1=1
and m.name like concat('%', #{param1}, '%')

SELECT e.id AS enterprise_id, e.enterprise_name, ( SELECT IF (count(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.enterprise_id = e.id AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEJOINAGREEMENT' ) AS enterprise_join_agreement, ( SELECT IF (count(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.enterprise_id = e.id AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEPRICEAGREEMENT' ) AS enterprise_price_agreement, ( SELECT count(*) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.enterprise_id = e.id AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTMAKSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT' ) AS ent_mak_supplementary_agreement, ( SELECT count(*) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.enterprise_id = e.id AND a.agreement_type = 'SERENTSUPPLEMENTARYAGREEMENT' ) AS ser_ent_supplementary_agreement, ( SELECT IF (count(*) > 0, 1, 0) FROM diyi_agreement a WHERE a.enterprise_id = e.id AND a.agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEPROMISE' ) AS enterprise_promise FROM diyi_enterprise e where 1=1
and e.enterprise_name like concat('%', #{param1}, '%')

SELECT a.id AS agreement_id, s.id AS service_provider_id,e.enterprise_name, a.agreement_no, a.sign_type, a.agreement_type, s.service_provider_name, a.online_agreement_url, a.paper_agreement_url, a.create_time, a.sign_state FROM diyi_agreement a INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise e ON a.enterprise_id = e.id INNER JOIN diyi_enterprise_service_provider ep ON ep.enterprise_id = e.id INNER JOIN diyi_service_provider s ON ep.service_provider_id = s.id WHERE a.agreement_type = 'ENTERPRISEPROMISE' AND s.service_provider_id = #{param1}
